name: The Chimney
description:
You are a mercenary with the task of protecting a research team, investigating a mysterious structure in the ocean. You will fight against evil creatures, manage your inventory, and slowly but surely make your way into the heart of the Chimney.

Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 with the theme -deeper and deeper-

Tools used:

Godot engine

Audacity

Dialogic plugin for Godot by Emilio Coppola: https://github.com/coppolaemilio/dialogic

Audio assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/handling-guns

https://opengameart.org/content/q009s-weapon-sounds

https://opengameart.org/content/the-free-firearm-sound-library

Font used:

https://www.dafont.com/de/fragment-core.font
